device_types.name: AIRX7 (L)
device_types.icon:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="50px" height="50px" viewBox="0 0 50 50" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet">
  
  <g class="device_icon" x="0" y="0" style="fill:none;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:3">
     <circle id="circle" cx="25" cy="25" r="23"></circle>

    <path d="M 0,0 50,50"></path>
    <path d="M 0,50 50,0"></path>
  </g>
</svg>

device_types.name: L733
device_types.icon:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="50" height="50" viewBox="0 0 50 50" id="square_circle_vertical_line">

      <rect id="square" width="48" height="48" x="1" y="1"></rect>

    <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="23"></circle>
    <path d="M 25,0 V 50"></path>
  </g>
</svg>

device_types.name: L622 (L)

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="50" height="50" viewBox="0 0 50 50" id="square_diagonal_cross">

      <path d="M 0,0 50,50"></path>
      <path d="M 0,50 50,0"></path>
  </g>

device_types.name: L634
device_types.icon:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="50" height="50" viewBox="0 0 50 50" id="square_triangle_icon" version="1.1">

    <rect id="square" width="48" height="48" x="1" y="1"></rect>

    <path d="M 6,44 44,44"></path>
    <path d="M 44,44 24,15"></path>

  </g>

</svg>
